article.Heading: Union Budget 2017-18: Govt announces new trade infra export scheme; BHEL, L&T up
article.Summary: Finance Minister Arun Jaitley in his Union Budget 2017-18 announced a new trade infrastructure export scheme.
article.Body:
Moneycontrol Bureau

Share price of engineering and construction companies including Larsen and Toubro, Adani Ports and BHEL gained 1.5 percent intraday Wednesday on government announcement of allocation of Rs 3.96 lakh crore towards infrastructure.

Finance Minister Arun Jaitley in his Union Budget 2017-18 announced a new trade infrastructure export scheme.

At 12:28 hrs Adani Ports was quoting at Rs 294.55, up Rs 1.15, or 0.39 percent and Larsen & Toubro was quoting at Rs 1,453.20, up Rs 8.45, or 0.58 percent.

Posted by Rakesh Patil
